value.name: CLEAR Alert issued for a missing Texas woman in immediate danger
value.description: The Cedar Hill Police Department is searching for Starnesia Williams, a missing Texas woman in immediate danger.

value.name: St. Paul Police Release Body Cam Footage Of Ronald Davis Shooting
value.description: In a show of transparency, St. Paul police released body camera footage Tuesday of the fatal shooting of Ronald Davis, Bill Hudson reports (2:16). WCCO 4 News At 5 – Sept. 24, 2019
